name: Treble
description:
Just like make game.

My first DD, and my first game!

A Match 3 RPG is on the way! Still working out bugs, etc. most notably holes can open up in the board. This is a very short and early demo. A shout out to Wilmer Lin for teaching me the ways of Match 3 and Unity. Another shout out to /agdg/ for giving me a great environment to make game.
